nl.naturalis.common.check.Check

Packages that use Check
Package Description
nl.naturalis.common.check
Classes related to checking preconditions

  • Uses of Check in nl.naturalis.common.check

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Check<T,​E> Check.given​(boolean... conditions)
    Imposes some extra preconditions that may or may not be related to the argument being checked by this instance.
